communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

The 11th Judicial Circuit has been identified as one of several circuits throughout the state currently denying victims of domestic violence and their children (also crime victims of physical, psychological and/or sexual abuse per FL statute 39) constitutional due process in family courtrooms. 

Recently, court observers were denied access within your circuit.

The lawless and biased behaviors of Florida family courts leads victims to believe judges statewide are colluding with state attorneys, law enforcement agencies, children's advocacy centers, guardian ad litems, child therapists, and DCF caseworkers to assist in the cover up of abuse crimes to keep victims trapped in family courts for years on end without a jury forcing systemic economic poverty on safe parents and court sanctioned violence on children.

In order to provide the public with transparency, we are demanding the below from your circuit:

-Signed oaths of office from all judges presiding in the 11th circuit
-Salary and job description of all judges presiding in the 11th circuit
-Salary and job description from all clerks presiding in the 11th circuit
-Salary and job description of all state attorneys within the 11th circuit
-Any and all bonds (Ex: surety bonds, etc.) you hold, your salary and job description
-Any and all bonds (Ex: surety bonds, etc.) held by all state attorneys, judges, and clerks within the 11th circuit



"Me Too Moms Florida" x "Mom Army Special Forces"
www.metoomoms.org

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Me Too Moms Florida

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Judicial Trafficking of Abused Children
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

The 20th circuit has been identified as one of several circuits throughout the state currently denying victims of domestic violence and their children (crime victims of physical, psychological and/or sexual abuse per FL statute 39) constitutional due process in family courtrooms. 

Additionally, the lawless and biased behaviors of Florida family court judges leads victims to believe judges statewide are colluding with state attorneys, law enforcement agencies, children's advocacy centers, guardian ad litems, child therapists, and DCF caseworkers to assist in the cover up of abuse crimes to keep victims trapped in family courts for years on end without a jury to force systemic economic poverty on safe parents and court sanctioned violence on Florida children.

In order to provide the public with transparency, we are demanding the below:

-Signed oaths of office from all judges presiding in the 20th circuit
-Salary and job description of all judges presiding in the 20th circuit
-Salary and job description from all clerks presiding in the 20th circuit
-Salary and job description of all state attorneys presiding in the 20th circuit
-Any and all bonds (Ex: surety bonds, etc.) you hold, your salary and job description
-Any and all bonds (Ex: surety bonds, etc.) held by all state attorneys, judges, and clerks within the 20th circuit

Thank you,

"Me Too Moms Florida" x "Mom Army Special Forces"
www.metoomoms.org

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Me Too Moms Florida
